data.message: Lmao .....Eminem I've always been a fan ever since you rapped about Stan I knew why you drew a line in the sand you never left the spotlight While others went ghost I will always love you the most your raps got me through some really bad times listening to your music to help me all the time your Rhymes are your truth real as hell true fans won't understand oh f****** well your Rhymes maybe nasty and all kinds of s*** you keep it real and that's legit Shady you may be crazy in a little bit Shady keep doing your thing and make them heads ring that's my rhyme I dedicated it to you I just want to put it out there that I love u ill never forget how ur music got me threw people may yell at me and not understand love ur number one fan
